documentation.subtitle: Kuma swiletelo na switirhisiwa swo ku pfuna ku vuyeriwa swinene eka Contentry. Hlawula nkongomiso lowu sekeriweke eka xiphemu xa wena.

whatsNew.description: Ku kumiwa hi ku tisungulela ku pfuxetiwa ni swilo leswintshwa leswi engeteriweke eka pulatifomo

whatsNew.feature4: Nxaxamelo wa ku cinca ka matimu

adminGuide.title: Nkongomiso wa Admin
adminGuide.description: Nkongomiso lowu heleleke wa vafambisi va pulatifomo. Dyondza ndlela yo lawula vatirhisi, ku langutisisa vuxopaxopi, na ku lulamisa swiletelo swa sisiteme.
adminGuide.feature3: Swiviko swa Timali & Mali leyi Nghenaka

enterpriseGuide.title: Nkongomiso wa Mabindzu
enterpriseGuide.description: Nkongomiso wa vafambisi va khampani. Dyondza ku lawula xipano xa wena, ku veka swisekelo swa vutivi, na ku khoma mpfumelelo wa nhundzu.
enterpriseGuide.feature3: Mafambiselo ya Ntirho ya Mpfumelelo wa Swilo leswi nga endzeni

userGuide.title: Buku ya Mutirhisi
userGuide.description: Hinkwaswo leswi u swi lavaka ku tumbuluxa, ku xopaxopa na ku kandziyisa swilo leswi nga endzeni. Swi hetisekile eka vatumbuluxi va swilo leswi nga endzeni na vaxavisi.
userGuide.feature1: Switirhisiwa swa ku Endliwa ka Swilo swa le Ndzeni & AI
userGuide.feature2: Nxopaxopo wa Swilo leswi nga endzeni & Ku landzelerisa
userGuide.feature4: Ku Hlanganisiwa ka Swihangalasamahungu swa Social Media

overview.intro: Tanihi mulawuri wa pulatifomo, u na mfikelelo eka switirhisiwa leswi heleleke swo veka tihlo na ku lawula pulatifomo hinkwayo ya Contentry. Nkongomiso lowu wu ta ku pfuna ku twisisa vuswikoti bya wena bya vufambisi.
overview.dashboardDesc: Admin Dashboard yi nyika xivono xa xinyenyana xa migingiriko ya pulatifomo na rihanyo.
overview.feature1: Ku vekiwa tihlo ka migingiriko ya vatirhisi hi nkarhi wa xiviri
overview.feature2: Nxopaxopo wa nhundzu ya pulatifomo hinkwayo
overview.feature3: Timetriki ta rihanyo ra sisiteme na matirhelo
overview.feature4: Ku fikelela hi ku hatlisa eka mintirho ya nkoka ya vufambisi
overview.tip: Endzela Admin Dashboard nkarhi na nkarhi ku tshama u ri karhi u tivisiwa hi mikhuva ya pulatifomo na ku kuma timhaka leti nga vaka kona ka ha ri na nkarhi.

userManagement.intro: Vufambisi bya vatirhisi i ntirho wa nkoka wa vufambisi lowu ku pfumelelaka ku langutela vatirhisi hinkwavo na mabindzu eka pulatifomo.
userManagement.viewUsersTitle: Ku Languta na ku Lawula Vatirhisi
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Nghena eka xiyenge xa Vulawuri bya Vatirhisi ku languta, ku lavisisa, na ku lawula vatirhisi hinkwavo va pulatifomo.
userManagement.feature1: Lavisisa no sefa vatirhisi hi mavito, imeyili, kumbe xiave
userManagement.feature2: Languta vuxokoxoko bya tiphrofayili ta vatirhisi na matimu ya migingiriko
userManagement.feature3: Cinca mintirho ya vatirhisi na mpfumelelo
userManagement.feature4: Pfuxeta kumbe ku susa tiakhawunti ta vatirhisi loko swi laveka
userManagement.rolesDesc: Mphikizano yi na mintirho yinharhu ya nkoka ya vatirhisi:
userManagement.role1: Admin: Mfikelelo wa pulatifomo lowu heleleke na vuswikoti bya vukorhokeri bya sisiteme
userManagement.role2: Enterprise Admin: U lawula xipano xa khamphani ya vona na swiyimiso
userManagement.role3: Mutirhisi: Swihlawulekisi swa ku tumbuluxiwa ka nhundzu na nxopaxopo wa ntolovelo
userManagement.warning: Minkarhi hinkwayo tiyisisa nkucetelo u nga si cinca mintirho ya vatirhisi kumbe ku susa tiakhawunti. Swiendlo leswi swi nga khumba maendlelo ya ntirho wa ntlawa.

analytics.intro: Vuxopaxopi byi nyika vutivi lebyi dzikeke eka ndlela leyi pulatifomo yi tirhisiwaka ha yona eka mabindzu hinkwawo na vatirhisi.
analytics.metric1: Nhlayo hinkwayo ya vatirhisi lava tirhaka na mikhuva ya ku kula
analytics.metric2: Ku tumbuluxiwa ka nhundzu na vholumo ya nxopaxopo
analytics.metric3: Mimpimo ya ku nghenelela ka pulatifomo
analytics.metric4: Ku hambanisiwa ka matirhiselo ya swihlawulekisi
analytics.metric5: Swikoweto swa ku landzelela na khombo eka mabindzu hinkwawo
analytics.tip: Rhumela swiviko swa vuxopaxopi bya switiviso swa vakhomaxiave hi ku tirhisa xiyenge xa Xiviko xo Dawuniloda.

financials.intro: Xiyenge xa Nkatsakanyo wa swa Timali xi nyika ku vonakala eka mali leyi nghenaka ya pulatifomo na timetriki ta xikhokhelo.
financials.revenueDesc: Languta rihanyo ra swa timali na mikhuva ya swikhokhelo eka mabindzu hinkwawo.
financials.feature1: Ku landzelerisa mali leyi nghenaka leyi vuyeleriwaka (MRR) ya n’hweti na n’hweti
financials.feature2: Ku hangalasiwa ka xiyimo xa xikhokhelo
financials.feature3: Matirhiselo ya xikweleti na matimu yo xava

systemConfig.intro: Ku lulamisiwa ka sisiteme swi ku pfumelela ku lawula swiletelo swa pulatifomo hinkwayo na ku hlanganisiwa.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Hlela na ku langutisisa ku hlanganisiwa ka vanhu va vunharhu:
systemConfig.integration1: Ayrshare API ya ku kandziyisa ka swihangalasamahungu swa le ka social media
systemConfig.integration2: Vukorhokeri bya AI bya ku tumbuluxiwa ka swilo na nxopaxopo
systemConfig.integration3: Ku lulamisiwa ka ku hakela hi ku tirhisa Stripe
systemConfig.tip: Minkarhi hinkwayo ringeta ku hlanganisiwa eka ndzhawu ya xiteji loko unga se endla ku cinca eka swiyimo swa vuhumelerisi.

gettingStarted.intro: Mi amukeriwile eka Contentry! Tanihi Mulawuri wa Mabindzu, u na switirhisiwa swo lawula xipano xa wena, ku simeka swiletelo swa nhundzu, na ku tiyisisa ku ringanana ka brand.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Landzelela magoza lawa ku veka akhawunti ya wena ya bindzu:
gettingStarted.step1: Nghena eka Switirhisiwa > Enterprise ku nghena eka dashboard ya khamphani ya wena
gettingStarted.step2: Layicha swiletelo swa brand ya khamphani ya wena na tipholisi eka Xihlovo xa Vutivi
gettingStarted.step3: Rhamba swirho swa ntlawa wa wena ivi u avela mintirho leyi faneleke
gettingStarted.step4: Hlela maendlelo ya ntirho ya mpfumelelo eka nkambisiso wa nhundzu
gettingStarted.tip: Hetisa xiyimiso xa wena xa Xiseketelo xa Vutivi u nga si rhamba swirho swa ntlawa ku tiyisisa leswaku swi na mfikelelo eka swiletelo swa brand ku sukela hi siku ro sungula.

teamManagement.intro: Vufambisi bya xipano lebyi humelelaka byi tiyisisa ntirhisano lowunene na vulawuri bya mfikelelo lebyi faneleke endzeni ka nhlangano wa wena.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Engetelani swirho leswintshwa eka ntlawa wa wena wa bindzu:
teamManagement.feature1: Nghenisa adirese ya imeyili ya xirho xa xipano
teamManagement.feature2: Hlawula ntirho wa vona (Muvumbi, Mufambisi, kumbe Mufambisi) .
teamManagement.feature3: Engetelani rungula ra munhu hi xiyexe leri u nga ri hlawulaka eka xirhambo
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Avela mintirho leyi sekeriweke eka vutihlamuleri:
teamManagement.role1: Muvumbi: A nga tumbuluxa no rhumela swilo leswi nga endzeni leswaku swi amukeriwa
teamManagement.role2: Mufambisi: A nga pfumelela/ala swilo leswi nga endzeni na ku lawula vatumbuluxi
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Mfikelelo wa bindzu hi ku helela ku katsa na ku hakela na swiyimiso
teamManagement.tip: Swirhambo swi hela endzhaku ka masiku ya 7. Tsundzuxa swirho swa ntlawa leswaku swi amukela swirhambo swa swona hi ku hatlisa.

knowledgeBase.intro: Xiseketelo xa Vutivi i vuhlayiselo bya le xikarhi bya khamphani ya wena bya swiletelo swa brand, tipholisi, na milawu ya nhundzu. Matsalwa lama layichiweke laha ma tivisa swilo leswi endliweke hi AI eka swirho hinkwaswo swa xipano.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Engetelani matsalwa lama nga ta kongomisa ku tumbuluxiwa ka swilo leswi nga endzeni:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Swiletelo swa xitayili xa brand na swiletelo swa rito
knowledgeBase.docType2: Tipholisi ta nawu na ku landzelela
knowledgeBase.docType3: Swiletelo swa ku veka swilo eka social media
knowledgeBase.tip: Upload swiletelo swa wena swa nkoka swinene swa brand ku sungula. AI yi rhangisa matsalwa eka Xiseketelo xa Vutivi bya khamphani ku tlula ku layicha ka mutirhisi un’wana na un’wana.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Endlelo ra ntirho ra mpfumelelo ri tiyisisa leswaku swilo hinkwaswo swi fikelela swipimelo swa khamphani ya wena u nga si kandziyisa.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Vuxokoxoko byi khuluka hi switeji leswi:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Muvumbi u tumbuluxa kumbe ku xopaxopa leswi nga endzeni
approvalWorkflow.step2: Swilo leswi nga endzeni swi rhumeriwa leswaku swi ta amukeriwa (loko swi laveka) .
approvalWorkflow.step3: Mufambisi u kambisisa no nyika vuxokoxoko
approvalWorkflow.step4: Swilo leswi pfumeleriweke swi nga kandziyisiwa eka tipulatifomo ta swa matirhiselo ya vanhu
approvalWorkflow.warning: Endla leswaku swilaveko swa mpfumelelo swi tirha eka Switirhisiwa ku tiyisisa leswaku nhundzu hinkwayo ya kamberiwa yi nga si kandziyisiwa.

billing.intro: Lawula xikhokhelo xa wena xa bindzu na ku langutisisa matirhiselo ya xikweleti.
billing.subscriptionDesc: Dashboard ya wena ya ku hakela yi nyika:
billing.feature1: Vuxokoxoko bya pulani ya sweswi na avelo ra swikweleti
billing.feature2: Matimu ya matirhiselo na swikweleti leswi saleke
billing.feature3: Matimu ya invoice na tindlela to hakela

adminUsersPage.subtitle: Lawula vatirhisi va pulatifomo hinkwayo
adminUsersPage.searchPlaceholder: Ku lavisisa hi email kumbe vito...

toasts.updateSuccess: Mutirhisi u pfuxetiwile hi ndlela leyi humelelaka

deleteModal.irreversible: Xiendlo lexi a xi nge tlheriseriwi endzhaku.

sections.contentCreation: Ku Tumbuluxiwa ka Swilo leswi nga endzeni

gettingStarted.intro: Mi amukeriwile eka Contentry! Nkongomiso lowu wu ta ku pfuna ku tumbuluxa swilo leswi khongotelaka, leswi fambisanaka na milawu hi ku tirhisa switirhisiwa leswi tirhisaka AI.
gettingStarted.step1: Seta profile ya wena hi vuxokoxoko lebyi kongomeke
gettingStarted.step2: Hlanganisa tiakhawunti ta wena ta social media
gettingStarted.step3: Endla Phurofayili ya Maqhinga ya brand kumbe pfhumba ra wena
gettingStarted.step4: Endla xiphemu xa wena xo sungula xa nhundzu
gettingStarted.tip: Sungula hi Phurofayili ya Maqhinga ku tiyisisa leswaku swilo swa wena hinkwaswo swi hlayisa thoni na marungula lama nga cincekiki.

contentCreation.intro: Contentry’s AI-powered content generation yi ku pfuna ku tumbuluxa ti post leti khomaka hi tisekoni.
contentCreation.generateDesc: Endla swilo leswi nga endzeni hi ku tirhisa AI:
contentCreation.feature1: Nghenisa nhlokomhaka kumbe xitsundzuxo lexi hlamuselaka leswi u lavaka ku posta hi swona
contentCreation.feature2: Hlawula tipulatifomo leti u ti kongomisaka (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, na swin’wana) .
contentCreation.feature3: Hlawula thoni ya wena yo tsala leyi u yi tsakelaka
contentCreation.feature4: Hi ku hlawula endla xifaniso lexi fambisanaka na xona
contentCreation.schedulingDesc: Hlela khalendara ya wena ya nhundzu:
contentCreation.schedule1: Seta tixedulu ta ku tumbuluxa swilo leswi vuyeleriwaka
contentCreation.schedule2: Hlawula masiku yo karhi ni minkarhi yo rhumela swilo hi ku tisungulela
contentCreation.schedule3: Endla leswaku ku tirha hi ku tisungulela kumbe ku kambisisa hi voko u nga si kandziyisa
contentCreation.tip: Tirhisa bokisi ro kambela ra ‘Nhundzu ya Nsusumeto’ loko u tumbuluxa tiphosi ta vuxavisi ku tiyisisa leswaku nxopaxopo wa ku landzelela wu tekela enhlokweni swiletelo swa nsusumeto.

analyzeContent.intro: Xivumbeko xa Kambisisa Vuxokoxoko xi kambisisa swilo swa wena ku vona loko swi landzelela, ku va na vuxiyaxiya bya ndhavuko, na ku ringanisiwa ka brand.
analyzeContent.howToDesc: Rhumela nhundzu leswaku yi ta xopaxopiwa:
analyzeContent.step1: Nghena eka Ku ringanisela ka Vuxokoxoko > Kambisisa Vuxokoxoko
analyzeContent.step2: Namarheta nhundzu ya wena eka ndhawu ya matsalwa
analyzeContent.step3: Hlawula Phurofayili ya Maqhinga eka mongo
analyzeContent.step4: Click Analyze ku kuma vuxokoxoko bya vuxokoxoko
analyzeContent.type1: Ku landzelela tipholisi na swiletelo swa khamphani
analyzeContent.type2: Ku twisisa ka ndhavuko eka swifundzha swo hambana
analyzeContent.type3: Ku ringanana ka rito ra brand na thoni
analyzeContent.type4: Makhombo lama nga vaka kona na switsundzuxo
analyzeContent.tip: Minkarhi hinkwayo kambisisa swilo leswi nga endzeni u nga si kandziyisa eka tipulatifomo ta le handle, ngopfungopfu eka matshalatshala lama kongomisaka eka swifundzha swo tala.

strategicProfiles.intro: Tiprofayile ta Maqhinga ti hlamusela mongo, thoni, na swiletelo swa ku tumbuluxa na nxopaxopo wa nhundzu.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Hlamusela vayingiseri lava kongomisiweke eka phurofayili na xikongomelo
strategicProfiles.feature2: Veka swibumabumelo swa ndhavuko na swa miganga
strategicProfiles.feature3: Layicha matsalwa lama kongomisiweke eka phurofayili na swiletelo
strategicProfiles.feature4: Hlela thoni ya ntolovelo na swihlawulekisi swa xitayili
strategicProfiles.tip: Endla Tiprofayile ta Maqhinga leti hambaneke ta matshalatshala yo hambana, tibrand, kumbe timakete ta miganga.

socialAccounts.intro: Hlanganisa tiakhawunti ta wena ta social media ku kandziyisa swilo hi ku kongoma ku suka eka Contentry.
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Matluka ya Munhu na Khamphani
socialAccounts.platform2: Twitter/X - Tiakhawunti ta munhu hi xiyexe
socialAccounts.warning: Hlayisa vuhlanganisi bya wena bya social account byi ri bya nkarhi wa sweswi. Tithokini leti hundzeriweke hi nkarhi ti nga ha sivela tipost leti hleriweke ku kandziyisiwa.

approvalProcess.intro: Loko bindzu ra wena ri ri na maendlelo ya ntirho ya mpfumelelo lama pfuriweke, nhundzu yi fanele ku kamberiwa yi nga si kandziyisiwa.
approvalProcess.step1: Endla kumbe ku xopaxopa leswi nga endzeni ka wena
approvalProcess.step2: Click 'Submit for Approval' ku rhumela eka mufambisi wa wena
approvalProcess.step3: Landzelela xiyimo xa mpfumelelo eka layini ya Mpfumelelo lowu Yimeleke
approvalProcess.tip: Engetelani tinotsi loko u rhumela nhundzu ku nyika vaxopaxopi mongo mayelana na swiboho swa wena swa vutumbuluxi.

aboutGuide.title: Malunghana na & Maendlelo Lamanene
aboutGuide.description: Dyondza leswaku Contentry i ya yini naswona u kuma maendlelo lamanene yo antswisa ku tumbuluxiwa ka wena ka swilo, swipfumelelano swa brand, na tiphrofayili ta vahlohloteri.
aboutGuide.feature4: Ku vekiwa ka Phurofayili ya Mukuceteri

sections.optimizeContent: Endla Leswaku Vuxokoxoko Bya Wena Byi Antswisa

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry i pulatifomo ya vutlhari bya nhundzu leyi fambiwaka hi AI leyi endleriweke ku pfuna vatumbuluxi va nhundzu, vaxavisi, na mabindzu ku tumbuluxa, ku xopaxopa, na ku kandziyisa swilo leswi fambisanaka na milawu hi xikalo. Kunga khathariseki leswaku u mukuceteri wa munhu hi xiyexe kumbe xiphemu xa ntlawa lowukulu wa vuxavisi, Contentry yi olovisa maendlelo ya ntirho wa wena wa nhundzu.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Hi pfumela eka ku nyika matimba eka vatumbuluxi hi switirhisiwa swo tlhariha leswi tiyisisaka leswaku xiphemu xin’wana na xin’wana xa nhundzu xi le ka brand, xi na vuxiyaxiya eka ndhavuko, naswona xi fambisana na swiletelo swa pulatifomo.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Ku tumbuluxiwa ka swilo leswi fambiwaka hi AI leswi fambelanaka na rito ra wena ra brand
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Ku kamberiwa ka ku landzelerisa ka nkarhi wa xiviri eka swilaveko swa milawu
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Nxopaxopo wa vutivi bya ndhavuko eka vayingiseri va misava hinkwayo
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Ku olovisiwa ka maendlelo ya ntirho ya mpfumelelo eka swipano swa mabindzu
whatIsContentry.tip: Ku phikizana ku hlanganisa matimba ya AI na vulawuri bya vanhu ku tisa nhundzu leyi twala eka vayingiseri va wena loko u ri karhi u tshama u ri karhi u landzelela.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry yi nyika nxaxamelo lowu heleleke wa switirhisiwa ku lawula xirhendzevutani xa wena hinkwaxo xa vutomi bya nhundzu:
keyFeatures.aiContentTitle: Ku Endliwa ka Swilo leswi Fambiwaka hi AI
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Endla swilo swa xiyimo xa le henhla leswi endleriweke brand ya wena na vayingiseri:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Ku tumbuluxiwa ka swilo swa tipulatifomo to tala (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram) .
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Tithoni to tsala leti nga cinciwaka (Ti xiphurofexinali, ta ku olova, ta ku hlohlotela) .
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: AI image generation ku fambisana na ti post ta wena
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Tiyisisa leswaku nhundzu ya wena yi fikelela swilaveko hinkwaswo u nga si kandziyisa:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Ku kamberiwa ka ku landzelerisa ka xiothomethi ku ya hi tipholisi ta khamphani
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Ku nyika swikoweto swa vutivi bya ndhavuko eka vayingiseri va matiko ya misava
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Ku kamberiwa ka khombo hi switsundzuxo leswi nga tekiwaka goza
keyFeatures.tip: Tirhisa Tiprofayile ta Maqhinga ku tiyisisa rito ra brand leri nga cincekiki eka swilo hinkwaswo leswi endliweke.

bestPractices.intro: Ku landzelela maendlelo lawa ya kahle swi ta ku pfuna ku kuma swo tala eka Contentry na ku tumbuluxa swilo leswi tirhaka kahle:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Simeka Mafambiselo ya Ntirho ya Vuxokoxoko
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Ku famba ka ntirho loku nga cincekiki ku tiyisisa khwalithi na vukorhokeri:
bestPractices.workflow1: Sungula hi ku veka Phurofayili ya wena ya Maqhinga hi swiletelo swa brand
bestPractices.workflow2: Endla swilo leswi nga endzeni hi ku tekela enhlokweni pulatifomo yo karhi na vayingiseri
bestPractices.workflow3: Minkarhi hinkwayo kambisisa leswi nga endzeni u nga si kandziyisa eka tipulatifomo ta le handle
bestPractices.workflow4: Tirhisa swihlawulekisi swa xiyimiso ku hlayisa cadence yo posta leyi nga cincekiki
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Ku tiveka loku nga cincekiki ku aka ku tshembana na ku xiximiwa:
bestPractices.consistency1: Layicha nkongomiso wa wena wa xitayili xa brand eka Xiseketelo xa Vutivi
bestPractices.consistency2: Tirhisa Phurofayili ya Maqhinga leyi fanaka eka matshalatshala lama fambelanaka
bestPractices.consistency3: Kambisisa swilo leswi endliweke hi AI ku tiyisisa leswaku swi fambisana ni rito ra wena
bestPractices.warning: Minkarhi hinkwayo kambisisa swilo leswi endliweke hi AI u nga si kandziyisa. Hambileswi AI ya hina yi nga ni matimba, vulawuri bya vanhu byi tiyisekisa vuyelo lebyinene.

optimizeContent.intro: Ku tumbuluxa swilo leswikulu i masungulo ntsena. Hi leyi ndlela yo antswisa ku nghenelela lokukulu:
optimizeContent.platformTitle: Ku Antswisiwa ka Pulatifomo yo Hlawuleka
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Pulatifomo yin’wana na yin’wana yi na swilaveko swo hlawuleka na ku langutela ka vayingiseri:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Tiyisisa eka vutivi bya xiphurofexinali, tirhisa marito ya nkoka ya indasitiri, xivumbeko xo leha xa amukeleka
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Mahungu yo koma, tirhisa ti hashtag hi ndlela ya maqhinga, nghenelela eka tinhlokomhaka leti nga trending
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Swilo leswi voniwaka swi tirha kahle, swi hlohlotela ku nghenelela ka vaaki
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Swifaniso swa xiyimo xa le henhla swa nkoka, tirhisa ti-hashtag leti faneleke, Switori swa ku nghenelela
optimizeContent.engagement1: Post nkarhi na nkarhi hi minkarhi leyinene eka vayingiseri va wena
optimizeContent.engagement2: Tirhisa swikombelo leswi sindzisaka swa ku teka goza eka nhundzu ya wena
optimizeContent.engagement3: Hlamula eka mavonelo na ku nghenelela na vaaki va wena
optimizeContent.engagement4: Landzelela vuxopaxopi ku twisisa leswaku hi swihi swilo leswi tirhaka kahle
optimizeContent.tip: Tirhisa xivumbeko xa xiyimiso xa Contentry ku posta hi minkarhi leyinene handle ka matshalatshala ya mavoko.

brandDeals.intro: Ntirhisano wa brand wu nga va nkhuluko wa nkoka wa mali. Hi leyi ndlela yo antswisa ndlela ya wena:
brandDeals.prep1: Hlayisa photifoliyo ya nhundzu ya xiphurofexinali, leyi nga cincekiki
brandDeals.prep2: Landzelela no kombisa timetriki ta wena ta ku nghenela
brandDeals.prep3: Aka xitirhisiwa xa vuhangalasi bya mahungu na nhlayo ya wena ya vaaki na ku fikelela
brandDeals.prep4: Tirhisa Contentry ku tumbuluxa swikombiso swa miehleketo ya nhundzu leyi nga na branded
brandDeals.pitchingDesc: Endla leswaku swichayachayana swa wena swi humelela:
brandDeals.pitch1: Lulamisa rito ra wena na mimpimanyeto ya brand na vayingiseri lava kongomisiweke
brandDeals.pitch2: Nyika miehleketo yo karhi ya nhundzu ku tlula swiringanyeto swa xivumbeko xa le henhla
brandDeals.pitch3: Katsa nxopaxopo wa ku landzelela ku kombisa leswaku nhundzu ya wena yi fikelela swiletelo
brandDeals.tip: Tirhisa ku kamberiwa ka ku landzelela ka Contentry loko u tumbuluxa swilo leswi seketeriweke ku tiyisisa leswaku swilaveko swa FTC na ku paluxiwa ka pulatifomo swa fikeleriwa.

influencerProfiles.intro: Phurofayili ya wena ya Maqhinga i masungulo ya maqhinga ya wena ya nhundzu. Hi leyi ndlela yo yi antswisa:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Phurofayili leyi hleriweke kahle yi tiyisisa leswi nga cincekiki, leswi nga eka brand:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Hlamusela niche ya wena na vayingiseri lava kongomisiweke kahle
influencerProfiles.setup2: Seta thoni ni xitayili xa wena xo tsala lexi u xi tsakelaka
influencerProfiles.setup3: Engetela ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka ndhavuko na xifundzha eka vayingiseri va wena
influencerProfiles.setup4: Layicha matsalwa ya swikombo lama hlamuselaka rito ra wena ra brand
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Ku ya emahlweni u antswisa xivumbeko xa wena leswaku u kuma mbuyelo wo antswa:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Languta swilo leswi endliweke naswona u lulamisa swiyimiso swa phurofayili tanihilaha swi lavekaka hakona
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Endla tiphrofayili to tala ta matshalatshala yo hambana kumbe vayingiseri
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Hlayisa Xiseketelo xa wena xa Vutivi xi ri karhi xi pfuxetiwa hi swiletelo swa sweswinyana swa brand
influencerProfiles.tip: Languta Phurofayili ya wena ya Maqhinga kotara yin’wana na yin’wana ku tiyisisa leswaku yi kombisa brand ya wena leyi cincaka na vayingiseri.

workflowsGuide.title: Mafambelo ya Ntirho & Nkongomiso wa ku nyika swikoweto
workflowsGuide.description: Dyondza ndlela leyi sisiteme yo nyika swikoweto yi tirhaka ha yona na ku twisisa goza rin’wana na rin’wana ra mafambelo ya ntirho ku suka eka nxopaxopo wa nhundzu ku ya eka mpfumelelo.
workflowsGuide.feature1: Endlelo ro nyika swikoweto ri hlamuseriwile
workflowsGuide.feature2: Nxopaxopo Mafambiselo ya Ntirho ya Vuxokoxoko

scoring.intro: Sisiteme yo nyika swikoweto eka Contentry yi nyika ku nyika swikoweto leswi nga erivaleni, leswi simekiweke eka nxupulo ku ku pfuna ku twisisa ndlela leyi nhundzu ya wena yi tirhaka ha yona. Swikoweto hinkwaswo swi sungula eka 100 naswona tinhla ti susiwa eka ku tlula nawu ko karhi kumbe timhaka leti kumiweke.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Xikoro hinkwaxo i nkatsakanyo lowu pimiweke wa swilo hinkwaswo swa nxopaxopo, ku suka eka 0 ku ya eka 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Excellent - Yi lulamerile ku kandziyisa, nhundzu yi antswisiwile swinene
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Swi kahle - Ku antswisiwa lokuntsongo ku ringanyetiwa ku nga si kandziyisiwa
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Swilaveko swa Nyingiso - Ku pfuxeta na ku pfuxetiwa swa laveka
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Flagged - Timhaka ta nkoka, u nga kandziyisi ku kondza ti lulamisiwa
scoring.overallCalcTitle: Xibalo xa Swikoweto hi ku angarhela
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Xikoro hinkwaxo xi tirhisa ku pima loku cinca-cincaka loku simekiweke eka mpimo wa khombo:
scoring.overallCalc2: Khombo ra le Henhla (Ku landzelerisa ≤60): (Ku landzelerisa × 50%) + (Ndhavuko × 30%) + (Ku pakanisa × 20%)
scoring.overallCalc4: Khombo ra nkoka (Ku landzelela ≤40): Xikoro hinkwaxo xi hard-capped eka 40 maximum
scoring.componentsDesc: Xikoro xa wena hinkwaxo xi hlayeriwa ku suka eka swiphemu swinharhu swa nkoka hi ku tirhisa sisiteme leyi simekiweke eka nhlawulo:
scoring.component1: Xikoro xa ku Landzelela: Yi sungula eka 100, yi susa tiphuinti hi ku tlula nawu loku kumiweke
scoring.component2: Xibalo xa Ntivo-vuxongi bya Ndhavuko: Avhareji ya swiyenge swa 6 swa ndhavuko swa Hofstede
scoring.component3: Xikoro xa ku Pakanisa: Yi sungula eka 100, yi susa tinhla hi ku nga kongomi kumbe mhaka leyi kumiweke
scoring.complianceDetailTitle: Xibalo xa ku Landzelela (Lexi Sekeriweke eka Nhlawulo) .
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Poso yin’wana na yin’wana yi sungula hi Xibalo xa ku Landzelela xa 100. Ku susiwa tiphuinti eka ku tlula nawu kun’wana na kun’wana:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Ku tlula nawu ka nkoka (-60 pts): Ku tlula nawu wa NDA, ku paluxiwa ka vuxokoxoko bya xihundla → Khombo ro herisa hi xihatla
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Ku tlula nawu lokukulu (-40 pts): Ku xanisiwa, xihlawuhlawu, mbulavulo wa rivengo → Khombo ra goza ra nawu
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Ku tlula nawu ka le henhla (-25 pts): Ku pfumaleka ka ku paluxiwa ka swinavetiso, ku tlula pholisi → Khombo ra tihakelo/ku yimisiwa
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Ku tlula nawu loku ringaneleke (-10 pts): Thoni leyi nga fanelangiki, ku hambuka lokutsongo ka nkongomiso → Vuleteri/xitsundzuxo
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Xikombiso: Ku kayivela #ad (-25) + Nkandziyiso wa thoni (-10) = Xikoro xo hetelela xa 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Ku tlula nawu ko tala ku stack - nhlawulo wun’wana na wun’wana wu tirhisiwa hi ku hlengeletiwa
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Ku tlula nawu loku kamberiweke: Vuxokoxoko bya xihundla, Ku xanisiwa, ku tlula NDA, Ku paluxiwa loku kayivelaka, Ku tlula pholisi, Thoni leyi nga fanelangiki
scoring.culturalDetailTitle: Xibalo xa Ndhavuko (Swiphemu swa 6 swa Hofstede) .
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Xikoro xa ndhavuko i xiringaniso xa swiyenge swa tsevu swa ndhavuko wa ximfumo swa Hofstede (0-100 xin’wana na xin’wana):
scoring.culturalDim1: Power Distance: Formality, ku xixima vulawuri vs. egalitarian, thoni yo olova
scoring.culturalDim2: Vumunhu bya munhu hi xiyexe vs. Vuhlanganisi: Ku kongomisa ka ‘Mina/Mina’ vs. ku kongomisa ka vaaki ka ‘Hina/Hina’
scoring.culturalDim3: Vununa vs. Vusati: Ririmi ro phikizana/ku tiyisisa vs. ntirhisano/ku twanana
scoring.culturalDim4: Ku papalata ku nga tiyiseki: Milawu, vuhlayiseki, ku kandziyisiwa ka ku va erivaleni vs. ku pfuleka eka ku nga twisiseki
scoring.culturalDim5: Ku kongomisiwa ka Nkarhi wo Leha: Ku kongomisa eka hakelo ya nkarhi lowu taka vs. ku vuyeriwa ka nkarhi wo koma
scoring.culturalDim6: Ku titsakisa vs. Ku tikhoma: Ku va na ntshembo/ku tiphina vs. Ririmi ro hlayisa/leri lawuriwaka
scoring.culturalCalc: Xikolo xa Ndhavuko = (Nhlayo ya 6 wa swikoweto swa dimenxini) ÷ 6
scoring.culturalRisk: Loko Xikolo xa Ndhavuko xi ya ehansi ka 50, ku tirhisiwa ku tika ka ‘Khombo ra Ndhuma’ ku sirhelela brand ya wena eka vayingiseri va misava hinkwayo
scoring.accuracyDetailTitle: Xibalo xa ku Pakanisa (Xi sekeriwe eka Nhlawulo) .
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Post yin’wana na yin’wana yi sungula hi Accuracy Score ya 100. Tinhla ti susiwa eka timhaka leti kumiweke:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Ku nga kongomi lokukulu/Mahungu lama hoxeke (-40 pts): Swihehlo swa mavunwa, datha leyi endliweke
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Xihlovo lexi nga Tshembekiki (-20 pts): Swikoxo leswi humaka eka swihlovo leswi nga tshembekiki
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Xikombelo lexi nga tiyisisiwangiki (-10 pts): Switatimende leswi nga kamberiwaka hi ntiyiso
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Xikombiso: Xikombelo xa mavunwa (-40) + Xihlovo lexi nga tiyisisiwangiki (-20) = Xikoro xo hetelela xa 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Timhaka to tala ta stack - nxupulo wun’wana na wun’wana wu tirhisiwa hi ku hlengeletiwa
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Vuxokoxoko byi funghiwa hi ku tisungulela hi ku ya hi mbuyelo wa nxopaxopo:
scoring.flag1: Ku hlanganisiwa ka kahle (Rihlaza): Swikoweto swa le henhla ka 80 - swi lunghekele ku kandziyisiwa
scoring.flag2: Swilaveka ku tekeriwa enhlokweni (Yellow): Swikoweto swa 60-79 - ku antswisiwa lokuntsongo ku ringanyetiwa
scoring.flag3: Fuged for Review (Orange): Swikoweto swa 40-59 - ku kamberiwa ka laveka ku nga si kandziyisiwa
scoring.flag4: Timhaka ta Nkoka (Ku Tshwuka): Swikoweto swa le hansi ka 40 - u nga kandziyisi ku kondza swi lulamisiwa
scoring.disclosureTitle: Ku Kamberiwa ka ku paluxiwa ka swinavetiso
scoring.disclosureDesc: Eka swilo swa nsusumeto, sisiteme yi tlhela yi kambela:
scoring.disclosure1: I Promotional: Yi kuma loko leswi nga endzeni swi navetisa kumbe swi seketeriwa
scoring.disclosure2: Yi na ku paluxiwa: Yi kambela ku paluxiwa loku faneleke ka #ad, #sponsored, kumbe ya ntirhisano
scoring.disclosure3: Ku Landzelela ka Xifundzankulu: Ku tiyisisa swilaveko swa ku paluxa swa FTC (US), EU, na Norway
scoring.disclosure4: Ku paluxiwa loku kayivelaka ku hlohlotela Ku tlula nawu ka le Henhla (-25 wa tinhla) eka Xikoro xa ku Landzelerisa
scoring.tip: Swikoweto swi hlayiwa nakambe nkarhi wun’wana na wun’wana loko ku xopaxopiwa leswi nga endzeni. Tirhisa xiyenge xa Tsala Hi vuntshwa ku antswisa hi ku tisungulela swilo leswi nga na swikoweto swa le hansi loko u ri karhi u hlayisa rungula ra wena.

analyze.intro: Ntirho wa Nxopaxopo wa Vuxokoxoko wu ku pfuna ku kambela nhundzu leyi nga kona ku vona loko yi landzeleriwa, ku va na vuxiyaxiya bya ndhavuko, na khwalithi u nga si kandziyisa.
analyze.stepsDesc: Landzelela magoza lawa ku xopaxopa leswi nga endzeni ka wena:
analyze.step1: Nghena eka Vutlhari bya Vuxokoxoko > Thebhu ya Nxopaxopo wa Vuxokoxoko
analyze.step2: Namarheta kumbe u thayipa nhundzu ya wena eka ndhawu ya tsalwa
analyze.step3: Hlawula Phurofayili ya Maqhinga ku tirhisa swiletelo swa wena swa brand
analyze.step4: Hi ku hlawula languta ‘Generate accompanying image’ loko u lava leswaku AI yi endla xifaniso
analyze.step5: Click 'Analyze' ku fambisa nxopaxopo lowu heleleke
analyze.type1: Ku Kamberiwa ka ku Landzelela: Ku tiyisisa swilo leswi nga endzeni ku ya hi tipholisi na milawu ya pulatifomo (FTC, GDPR) .
analyze.type2: Ku twisisa ka Ndhavuko: Ku kambela swilo leswi nga ha khunguvanyisaka kumbe leswi nga riki na vuxiyaxiya eka ndhavuko
analyze.type3: Ku Tiyisisa Ku Pakanisa: Ku kambela swihehlo na mintiyiso ku vona loko swi ri ntiyiso
analyze.type4: Ku ringanisa Brand: Ku pimanisa swilo leswi nga endzeni na swiletelo swa wena swa Phurofayili ya Maqhinga
analyze.tip: Tirhisa buti ya ‘Tsala nakambe’ ku antswisa hi ku tisungulela nhundzu leyi kumaka swikoweto swa le hansi ka 70. AI yi ta lulamisa timhaka leti funghiweke loko yi ri karhi yi hlayisa rungula ra wena.

generate.intro: Ntirho wa Endla Vuxokoxoko wu tirhisa AI ku tumbuluxa nhundzu leyintshwa leyi simekiweke eka nhlokomhaka ya wena, swilaveko swa pulatifomo, na swiletelo swa brand.
generate.step1: Nghena eka Vutlhari bya Vuxokoxoko > thebhu ya ku Endliwa ka Vuxokoxoko
generate.step2: Nghenisa nhlokomhaka ya wena kutani u hlamusela leswi u lavaka ku swi tumbuluxa
generate.step3: Hlawula pulatifomo (tipulatifomo) ya wena leyi u yi kongomisaka na thoni yo tsala
generate.step4: Hlawula Phurofayili ya Maqhinga ku kuma ku ringanana ka brand
generate.step5: Click 'Generate' ku tumbuluxa swilo leswi fambiwaka hi AI
generate.optionsDesc: Endla leswaku swilo swa wena leswi endliweke hi ku ya hi swihlawulekisi leswi:
generate.option1: Ku Hlawula Pulatifomo: Hlawula pulatifomo yin’we kumbe yo tala (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram) .
generate.option2: Thoni yo Tsala: Hlawula eka ya Xiphurofexinali, ya Xiphurofexinali, ya Nhlohlotelo kumbe ya Vuxokoxoko
generate.option3: Ku leha ka Vuxokoxoko: Lulamisa ku leha loku kunguhatiweke eka nhundzu ya wena
generate.option4: Ku Endliwa ka Swifaniso: Cinca-cinca ku endla xifaniso lexi fambisanaka na xona lexi endliweke hi AI
generate.tip: Vuxokoxoko lebyi endliweke byi xopaxopiwa hi ku tisungulela endzhaku ka ku tumbuluxiwa. Languta swikoweto naswona tirhisa swikoweto swa mbuyelo ku pfuxeta loko swi laveka.

schedulePrompt.intro: Xitsundzuxo xa Xedulu xi ku pfumelela ku veka ku tumbuluxiwa ka swilo swa xiothomethi leswi tirhaka hi minkarhi leyi vekiweke, ku hlayisa khalendara ya wena ya nhundzu yi tele handle ko nghenelela hi voko.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Endla switsundzuxo leswi humesaka swilo hi ku tisungulela:
schedulePrompt.step1: Endla xitsundzuxo xa wena xa ku tumbuluxa swilo hi nhlokomhaka na swihlawulekisi
schedulePrompt.step2: Seta nkarhi wa xiyimiso (siku na siku, vhiki na vhiki kumbe masiku yo karhi) .
schedulePrompt.step3: Hlawula nkarhi lowu nhundzu yi faneleke ku endliwa ha wona
schedulePrompt.step4: Endla leswaku 'Auto-analyze' yi tirha ku fambisa nxopaxopo eka swilo leswi endliweke hi ku tisungulela
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Hlayisa ku posta loku nga cincekiki handle ka ntirho wa mavoko wa siku na siku
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Endla swilo hi nkarhi wa tiawara letinene ta vutumbuluxi
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Aka ndhawu leyi nga sala endzhaku ka nhundzu leswaku yi kamberiwa na ku amukeriwa
schedulePrompt.tip: Switsundzuxo leswi hleriweke swi humesa nhundzu eka switshuriwa swa wena. Kambisisa no pfumelela u nga si kandziyisa ku tiyisisa khwalithi.

schedulePost.intro: Xedulu Poso yi ku pfumelela ku fola layini ya swilo leswi pfumeleriweke ku kandziyisa hi ku tisungulela hi minkarhi leyinene eka tipulatifomo ta wena ta swa mahungu ta swa matirhiselo ya vanhu leti hlanganisiweke.
schedulePost.step1: Ku suka eka xivono xin’wana na xin’wana xa nhundzu, tinya 'Schedule' ematshan'wini ya 'Publish Now'.
schedulePost.step2: Hlawula siku leri u ri kongomisaka na nkarhi wo kandziyisa
schedulePost.step3: Hlawula leswaku hi tihi tipulatifomo ta swa matirhiselo ya vanhu leti hlanganisiweke leti u nga ta kandziyisa eka tona
schedulePost.step4: Tiyisisa no engetela eka layini ya wena leyi hleriweke
schedulePost.optionsDesc: Hlela ti post ta wena leti hleriweke:
schedulePost.option1: Nkarhi Wo Karhi: Hlawula siku ni nkarhi lowu kongomeke wo kandziyisa
schedulePost.option2: Nkarhi lowunene: AI a ringanyete minkarhi leyinene yo rhumela leyi sekeriweke eka datha ya ku nghenelela
schedulePost.option3: Tipulatifomo to Tala: Hlela swilo leswi fanaka eka tipulatifomo to tala hi nkarhi wun’we
schedulePost.warning: Ti post leti hleriweke ti lava kwalomu ka akhawunti yin’we ya social media leyi hlanganisiweke. Hlanganisa tiakhawunti eka Switirhisiwa > Tiprofayile ta Ntshamisano.

approval.intro: Mafambiselo ya Ntirho ya Mpfumelelo ya tiyisisa khwalithi ya nhundzu hi ku lava ku kamberiwa ka mufambisi ku nga si kandziyisiwa. Leswi i swa nkoka ngopfu eka swipano swa mabindzu na tiindasitiri leti lawuriwaka.
approval.processDesc: Ndlela leyi nhundzu yi fambaka ha yona eka maendlelo ya ntirho ya mpfumelelo:
approval.step1: Muvumbi u rhumela swilo hi ku tikhoma 'Rhumela ku kuma mpfumelelo'.
approval.step2: Vuxokoxoko byi humelela eka Fola ya Mpfumelelo ya mufambisi
approval.step3: Mufambisi u kambisisa nhundzu, swikoweto, na mbuyelo wa nxopaxopo
approval.step4: Mufambisi u pfumelela, u kombela ku cinca, kumbe u ala leswi nga endzeni
approval.status1: Xitshuriwa: Swilo leswi nga endzeni swa tirhisiwa, a swi si rhumeriwa
approval.status2: Ku yimerile Mpfumelelo: Yi rhumeriwile naswona yi yimele ku kamberiwa ka mufambisi
approval.status3: Yi pfumeleriwile: Yi lunghekele ku kandziyisa kumbe ku hlela
approval.status4: Ku Pfuxetiwa ka Swilaveko: Mufambisi u komberile ku cinca - kambela mbuyelo na ku rhumela nakambe
approval.tip: Engetelani tinotsi loko u rhumela nhundzu ku nyika vaxopaxopi mongo mayelana na swiboho swa wena swa vutumbuluxi. Leswi swi hatlisisa endlelo ro pfumelela.

gdpr.weValuePrivacy: Hi Teka Vuhlayiseki Bya Wena bya Nkoka
gdpr.cookieDescription: Hi tirhisa tikhukhi ku ndlandlamuxa ntokoto wa wena wo pfula, ku tirhela swilo leswi endleriweke wena, na ku kambisisa thrafikhi ya hina. Hi ku tikhoma "Amukela Hinkwaswo", u pfumela ku tirhisa ka hina tikhukhi. U nga ha cinca leswi u swi tsakelaka kumbe u ala tikhukhi leti nga riki ta nkoka.
gdpr.readPrivacyPolicy: Hlaya Pholisi ya hina ya Vuhlayiseki
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Swi laveka eka ku tiyisisiwa, vuhlayiseki, na ntirho wa xisekelo. A swi nge swi koti ku tshikiwa.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Hi pfuneni ku twisisa ndlela leyi vaendzi va tirhisanaka ha yona na pulatifomo ya hina ku antswisa vukorhokeri bya hina.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Yi tirhisiwa ku yisa swinavetiso leswi endleriweke munhu hi xiyexe na ku pima ku humelela ka pfhumba.
